name: SPEXY
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.
The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en:
What is the project about?
SPEXY represents a first stage of P2E game, existing within decentralized A4 wallet.

What makes your project unique?
This introductory level provides players with opportunity to grow and develop their characters, who will later become key participants in dynamic battles in A4 metaverse. Central concept of game is to create and develop your team of characters, each with their own unique features and abilities. A distinctive feature of SPEXY is its accessibility for everyone: you can start playing without any investment, thanks to well-thought-out character rental mechanics. Economic structure of game is designed to satisfy diverse needs of players at different levels.

History of your project.
SPEXY is part of the A4.finance ecosystem and the beginning of the story lies in the development of A4. The project was created with the aim of creating convenient financial instruments and adapting users to Web3

What’s next for your project?
SPEXY will move into the second stage - the metaverse from A4 and will have more game scenarios

What can your token be used for?
To receive rewards from the game, as well as it will be entered in the metaverse

This introductory level provides players with opportunity to grow and develop their characters, who will later become key participants in dynamic battles in A4 metaverse. Central concept of game is to create and develop your team of characters, each with their own unique features and abilities. A distinctive feature of SPEXY is its accessibility for everyone: you can start playing without any investment, thanks to well-thought-out character rental mechanics. Economic structure of game is designed to satisfy diverse needs of players at different levels.

History of your project.
SPEXY is part of the A4.finance ecosystem and the beginning of the story lies in the development of A4. The project was created with the aim of creating convenient financial instruments and adapting users to Web3

What’s next for your project?
SPEXY will move into the second stage - the metaverse from A4 and will have more game scenarios

What can your token be used for?
To receive rewards from the game, as well as it will be entered in the metaverse
